title: Riot games bugsplat makes players repair their client and lose games
body: I was in a lobby to enter solo/duo match, after 5 min we selected our champs and we were ready to enter the game,after that .. I got bugsplat,my client didn't respond to my reconnect and I was needed to repair my client and lose game,by remake.Thanks riot for the great job on bugsplat error,i just need my lp back and a better client

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the crash after champion select, that's pretty frustrating.  Bugsplats can happen as a result of bad drivers, hardware, or game files so running a repair was a solid step.  Let me know if this is still an issue, but I suggest testing it in a custom game to prevent anymore penalties.
